Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to computation of the along wind spectrum using the Kaimal Spectrum with flexibility of parameter choice

computeGeneralizedKaimalWindAutoSpectrum(frequency,height,meanSpeed,shearVelocity,a = 200.0,b = 1.0,c = 0.0,d = 1.0,e = 1.0,f = 1.0,g = 1.0,h = 50.0,i = 1.0,j = 5.0/3.0); frequency = the frequency value for which the spectrum will be calculated height = the heigh at which the mean wind speed is calculated meanSpeed = the mean wind speed at the height shearVelocity = the shear velocity of the flow a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j = some constant parameters
